description:
Happy Birthday Annie Cruz! This hottie just turned 22 so we celebrated fuckingmachines.com style with a Robo-spanking and machine shagging! After a nice Birthday ass paddling, we give Annie a brand new machine to christen. The Black Magic is the latest machine to join the Fuckingmachines arsenal. And as if Annie spanking and wanking isn’t enough - remember a few weeks back when the sexy Flower Tucci threw down the squirting gauntlet challenging Annie to a squirt off? Well, Miss Annie replies by riding the intruder at top speed just like Flower did BUT Annie ups the ante by cumming while the machine pounds her full throttle, something Flower didn’t manage to do. The competition is on for Annie Cruz and Flower Tucci to go pussy to pussy to prove who is the boss of the machines.
title: Annie Cruz
